name: node-comlink
description: An adapter for node worker threads to work with Comlink

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run compile && rollup lib/child_process.js --file lib/child_process.js --format cjs && rollup lib/worker_threads.js --file lib/worker_threads.js --format cjs
scripts.postversion: git push origin master && git push origin --tags && npm publish

author: Roc
